column2: U.S. justices rule for PPL Corp in overseas tax caseU.S. justices rule for PPL Corp in overseas tax case WASHINGTON The Supreme Court on Monday ruled for utility PPL Corp  in its dispute with the U.S. Internal Revenue Service over credits the company claimed to offset overseas tax payments.
